document.title: Elnsburg — The City of Tiers
document.summary: High Elnsburg, Mid Elnsburg, and Low Elnsburg — and the factions that bind them.

body.raw: Elnsburg is divided into three tiers with a council tangled between Matriarchs and Patriarchs.
body.code:

document.title: On Curses and Their Permanence
document.summary: A primer on the rules and risks of curses in the Continuum.

body.raw: Curses are permanent in this setting; breaking them has a cost even saints decline to pay.
body.code:

document.title: Chapter 1 — Goatprints on Marble
document.synopsis: A curse, a city, and a very stubborn girl.

body.raw:
Welcome to **Elnsburg**, where saints smile and consequences collect.

<Spoiler>
This is a demo spoiler block you can remove.
</Spoiler>

See also <WikiLink slug="elnsburg-overview">the city overview</WikiLink>.

document.title: Chapter 2 — The Tea That Talked Back
document.synopsis: Coffee argues. Tea negotiates. Iskra ignores both.

body.raw: Second chapters are for making promises you may or may not keep.
body.code:
